pages.text: Everywhere it rattles and fizzles, whistles and smokes. An ensemble of Assemblage.$(br2)Surely a few of those machines will come in handy.

pages.title: Crushing Gemstones
pages.text: $(item)Gemstones$() can be crushed, yielding some $(item)Gemstone Powder$().

pages.title: Milling Leaves
pages.text: $(item)Colored Leaves$() can be crushed, yielding $(item)Pigment$() and a higher chance for $(item)Colored Saplings$().

pages.title: Crushing Colored Logs
pages.text: Crushing $(thing)Colored Logs$() results in some additional $(thing)Pigment$().

pages.title: Milling Quitoxic Reeds
pages.text: $(l:resources/quitoxic_reeds)Quitoxic Reeds$() can be milled into powder.

pages.title: Milling Frostbite Crystal
pages.text: Milling $(l:resources/liquid_crystal_essences)Frostbite Crystal$() will yield you a nice amount of $(item)Frostbite Essence$().

pages.title: Milling Blazing Crystal
pages.text: Milling $(l:resources/liquid_crystal_essences)Blazing Crystal$() will yield you a nice amount of $(item)Incandescent Essence$().
